alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sevier Valley; Southwest Utah; Upper Sevier River Valleys; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 10:13PM MST until January 01 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Utah Valley, Upper Sevier River Valleys, Southwest Utah, Eastern Juab/Millard Counties and Sevier Valley. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions, including snow packed roads and reduced visibilities, can be expected at times through Friday evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sevier Valley; Southwest Utah; Upper Sevier River Valleys; Utah Valley
